responsibilities: Perform proof of concepts, benchmarks, or technical evaluations with clients
Build and publish repeatable cloud solutions
Create new industry-focused solutions using cloud native technologies
Implement and scale programs designed to improve customer success
Develop and maintain communication with key project collaborators and decision makers
Help customers understand their business problems, discover their environments, and suggest technology solutions using Oracle Cloud services
skills: Strong software engineering and project management fundamentals
Experience with 2 or more scripting languages (Python, C#, Java, C++, SQL, etc.)
Ability to balance several competing priorities
Hands-on experience with Cloud Services (Oracle, AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.)
Hands-on experience with Cloud Native technologies such as container deployments, streaming, monitoring
Hands-on experience with data analytics and data science techniques
Skills in CI/CD & build automation tooling (Chef, Terraform, Ansible, etc.)
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on cloud solutions, technical workshops, customer success, and communication with project collaborators. There is no explicit mention of Generative AI or language models in the responsibilities. However, the skills section includes "Experience with AI/ML/LLM infrastructure," which directly references Large Language Models (LLMs). This indicates that the job may involve working with LLMs or related technologies, even if it is not the primary focus of the responsibilities listed.
